thread.title: looks sad in NYC after ex seen kissing Selena
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid looks sad in NYC after ex seen kissing Selena | Daily Mail Online

author: Heidi Parker For Dailymail.com
title: looks sad in NYC after ex seen kissing Selena
text:
Valentine's Day is a terrible time to nurse a broken heart.
But that seems to be what beauty Bella Hadid was doing on Tuesday.
The Vogue model looked somber in New York City just hours after photos of her ex-beau The Weeknd kissing siren Selena Gomez on a yacht in Los Angeles surfaced.
In pain: Valentine's Day is a terrible time to nurse a broken heart. But that seems to be what beauty Bella Hadid was doing on Tuesday
Tough times: The Vogue model looked somber in New York City just hours after photos of her ex-beau The Weeknd kissing siren Selena Gomez on a yacht in Los Angeles surfaced
The leggy sister of Gigi Hadid had on a dark outfit that didn't look to V-Day themed.
A dark furry jacket was worn over a top that seemed to say LOVE.
Funky jeans with blue flames up the sides looked borrowed from Jennifer Lopez circa 1998. Her accessories included chunky black boots and a sensible structured mini purse.
Gomez loves her Weeknd: They were seen kissing up a storm on the deck of a three level mega yacht in the Marina Del Rey neighborhood of Los Angeles
Chemistry check: The singers were seen on stage together at the Victoria's Secret Fashion show in December 2015
The way they were: Hadid arrive for the 58th annual Grammy Awards in LA in February 2016
Meanwhile, it seems as if the Starboy hitmaker has fallen hard for Texas native Gomez.
They were seen kissing up a storm on the deck of a three level mega yacht in the Marina Del Rey neighborhood of Los Angeles, which is a short drive from Beverly Hills.
The chart topper had on a cap and jacket as he leaned into his Good For You singer who got out of rehab last year.
Trying to move on: The looker with Kendall Jenner heading to the Fendi Party during NYFW four days ago
Gomez had her hand on his neck and seemed to be thrilled with his company.
The Weeknd and Gomez have been seeing each other for months, but only went public in January.
Then they quickly went on a trip to Italy where they kissed their way through Florence and Venice.
And then there was this: The former Disney star was seen with pals as her beau was off in the distance on Monday
Bella finally reacted to her ex moving on when she was interviewed in Teen Vogue.
The former equestrian who has been battling Lupus said, 'Love hurts.'
Selena's ex Justin Bieber - who she can't seem to shake no matter how hard she tries - does not seem to like the Hands To Myself hit maker with The Weeknd.
He has taken several stabs at the newcomer, making fun of his music and fame.
At a shot: The stunner sitting next to Vogue editor Anna Wintour at the Coach show on Tuesday
